entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 10:44 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:44 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 10:44 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
